about_the_game:
This multiplayer social deduction game plunges you into an abandoned mansion in the middle of the night with a group of friends. In this 1v1 game, you take on the role of killer or protector. You'll have to act strategically and remain discreet to achieve your goal and win!
⠀

Objective : Kill a guest list

  • Find a way to eliminate your targets
  • Remain discreet so as not to attract the protector's attention
  • Cut the power to take advantage of darkness
  • Clean up the traces of your crimes

Objective: Protect the group or shoot the killer

  • Use your gun to stop the killer
  • Investigate and identify the killer
  • Set a trap for the killer
  • Identify group members with suspicious behavior

Features

  • Every game is different: Many game elements change randomly from game to game
  • Balancing options available
  • A wide range of actions available to the player
  • No one plays an uninteresting role! Simple group members are non-player characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-10-11
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Murder Hunt is a multiplayer social deduction game. A group of friends spend the night in an abandoned mansion. Play as the killer and discreetly eliminate a list of guests, or choose the protector, charged to defend the group with his revolver!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
